_sText:
A medium sized map which is based off of a few Halo 1 maps, provides multiple paths aswell as full cubemapping.

Bomb site can be found in the outdoors area inside the tower, along with 3 awps, works best when sniper rifles are restricted on this map, so you can only pick them up.

Note that this is not complete and that the sounds, bots navigation and a few areas will be fixed when the final version comes.

Also note that this is my first serious attempt at mapping for the Source engine.

www.mod-shack.com / RockstarRox0rs@gmail.com
